'''22w16a''' is the sixth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.19]], released on April 20, 2022,<ref>{{snap|22w16a|April 20, 2022}}</ref> which introduces new music, tweaks to the [[allay]], more predictable randomized events, and fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== Items ===
'''[[File:Disc Fragment 5 JE1.png|32px]] [[Disc fragment]]'''
* Added a new music disc fragment titled "5".
** Can only be obtained from the [[chest]]s in the [[ancient cities]]. They are extremely rare and hard to obtain.

'''[[Music disc]]'''
* [[File:Music Disc 5 JE1 BE1.png|32px]] Added a new music disc by [[Samuel Åberg]] titled "[[5]]".
** Can only be obtained through crafting by using 9 "Disc Fragment 5"s.

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''[[Painting]]'''
* {{Animate|Earth JE1 BE2.png; Fire JE1 BE2.png; Water JE1 BE2.png; Wind JE1 BE2.png|32px}} Added unused painting {{cd|d=and|earth|wind|fire|water}} from {{BE}}.
** These paintings are not placeable by default, but can be added through [[commands]] (such as {{cmd|/summon painting ~ ~ ~ {variant:"water"} }}) or through a [[data pack]].

=== Command format ===
'''[[Game rule]]s'''
* Added <code>doWardenSpawning</code> game rule, to control whether [[warden]]s can be spawned or not, defaults to <code>true</code>.

=== General ===
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* Added a heap memory allocation metric.

'''[[Music]]'''
* Added new music, all by [[Lena Raine]].<ref group=note>Released to all 1.19 snapshots.</ref>
** "Ancestry" only plays in the [[deep dark]].
** "Aerie", "Firebugs", and "Labyrinthine" play in the [[lush caves]], all types of [[swamp]]s, [[forest]]s, and [[jungle]]s, as well as the [[title screen]].

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* Added the following block tag:
** <code>#frogs_spawnable_on</code>: {{cd|d=and|grass_block|mud|mangrove_roots|muddy_mangrove_roots|moss_carpet}}.
* Added the following painting variant tag (new type):
** <code>#placeable</code>: {{cd|d=and|kebab|aztec|alban|aztec2|bomb|plant|wasteland|pool|courbet|sea|sunset|creebet|wanderer|graham|match|bust|stage|void|skull_and_roses|wither|fighters|pointer|pigscene|burning_skull|skeleton|donkey_kong}}.
*** These paintings are placeable in Survival mode.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[Froglight]]s'''
* Now movable by [[piston]]s.

=== Items ===
'''[[Bucket of tadpole]]'''
* Now plays sounds when picking up or releasing [[tadpole]]s.

=== Mobs ===
'''[[Allay]]'''
* Raised health from {{hp|10}} to {{hp|20}}.
* Lowered the delay after item throw from 5 seconds to 3 seconds.
* Raised item search range from 9 to 32.
* Changed movement speeds:
** Now slower when just wandering.
** Now faster when collecting items, going to the player or going to a [[note block]].
* Changed throwing arc to make them hit their target more consistently.
* Now drop the item they were holding when dying.
* Are now unable to despawn if they are holding an item they have been given.
* Now make a sound when they toss an item.

'''[[Frog]]'''
* Can now spawn on [[grass block]], [[mud]], [[moss carpet]], [[mangrove roots]] and [[muddy mangrove roots]].

'''[[Tadpole]]'''
* Now make a sound when they grow up into a frog.

=== World generation ===
'''[[Mangrove swamp]]'''
* Atmospheric water color has been changed to a pale green tint.

=== General ===
'''LWJGL'''
* Updated LWJGL library to 3.3.1.

'''[[Music]]'''
* The places where the following existing music can be played are changed:<ref group=note>Changed to all 1.19 snapshots.</ref>
** "Stand Tall", "Wending", and "Infinite Amethyst" can no longer be played in the main menu.
** "Left to Bloom" and "One More Day" can no longer be played in the main menu, and can be played in all types of forests, jungles, and [[old growth taiga]]s.
** "Floating Dream" and "Comforting Memories" can be played in all types of forests, jungles, and old-growth taigas.

'''[[Particles (Java Edition)|Particles]]'''
* Removed the particle <code>allay_dust</code>.

'''Randomized events predictability'''
* Following randomized events are now more predictable, and no longer have a possibility of extreme behaviors:
** Placement and velocity of things dropped from [[dropper]]s or [[dispenser]]s.
** Placement and velocity of items spawned from containers upon destruction.
** Randomized <code>follow_range</code> component attribute for mobs.
** Velocity of [[horse]]s spawned from skeleton traps.
** [[Blaze]] random position and randomized speed of blaze projectiles.
** Randomized portion of damage and velocity of [[arrow]]s.
** Randomized flight pattern of [[firework rocket]]s.
** Bobbing patterns and time until a fish for [[fishing rod]]s.

'''[[Tag]]s'''
* The <code>#music_discs</code> item tag now includes the new <code>music_disc_5</code>.
